result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
11:39 AM Defendant YULIYA E RUFF in court.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad appeared by phone via Zoom for YULIYA E RUFF.  Attorney Sara Matthews in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Matthews calls cases and notes appearances.  
22CF61 and 22CF293
Preliminary hearings in both matters.
Defendant is waiving preliminary hearings.
Court finds defendant has freely and voluntarily waived preliminary hearings in both cases.
Bond to continue.
Arraignment scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:43 AM Prosecuting attorney Scott Zehr in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant YULIYA E RUFF in court.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for YULIYA E RUFF. 
Close to settlement, waiting on response to counterproposal. 
Bond continued.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 12, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 11:30 am.

11:21 AM Prosecuting attorney Sheila M. Yohnk in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant YULIYA E RUFF in court.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for YULIYA E RUFF. 
22CF293, 22CF61
No resolution at this time. 
Complete booking process. 
Bond continued.
Review hearing scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 10:00 am.

BOND IN 22CF61 (MODIFIED) TO ALSO APPLY TO 22CF293 (NEW)
Defendant is ordered to report to pretrial monitoring immediately after court and must comply with pretrial
monitoring conditions.
Defendant shall not possess any drug paraphernalia / any syringes unless medically required. Not to possess or consume any illegal drugs / any prescription drugs not prescribed.
Not to possess or consume any alcohol.
Not to go on any premises where primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.
Not to drive without a valid driver's license.
Not to drive any vehicle without Ignition Interlock device.
Not to drive with any alcohol / illegal drugs in system.

11:07 AM Prosecuting attorney Sara Matthews in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant YULIYA E RUFF in court.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for YULIYA E RUFF. 
22CF61- Resolution reached. 22CF293 Should be resolved with 22CF61
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:15 AM Prosecuting attorney Roy La Barton Gay in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant YULIYA E RUFF in court.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for YULIYA E RUFF. 
Counsel recently appointed. 
Defendant reminded to comply with pre-trial monitoring. 
Bond continued.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Review hearing scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.
